int sys::SignalEvent::trigger_value ( pid_t  pid) const
inline

Send a signal to a process with a value associated with the signal.

This method sends a signal and associated value to a process.

Parameters
pidThe process ID of the receiving signal
valueThe value associated with the signal (user defined)
Returns
Zero on success
